data.description: We are looking for a Core Tech Engineer Intern to join us for our Obsidian University Internship Program. Come help us make our next world-class roleplaying game!Work closely with our Core Tech and Game Teams to generate tools which help create our immense open worlds and breathe life into our games. The ideal candidate has a strong work ethic, outstanding problem-solving skills, and the ability to deliver on time.ResponsibilitiesProgram, debug, and optimize game features and toolsCollaborate with developers on designs and implementationsIterate on features and respond constructively to feedbackRequirementsAn avid gamer with a passion for making gamesEnjoy collaborating with others in a team environmentExcellent communication skillsSelf-motivated with a strong work ethicPlusesWorking knowledge of C++, C#, and/or PythonExperience with Unreal EngineWorking knowledge of debugging issues in codeExamples of personal or school game projectsPassion for gaming and the games Obsidian makesObsidian Entertainment is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.Please, no phone calls or drop-ins. We only accept electronic applications.The estimated base pay range for this role is:$22.00 - 26.00 per hourApplications will close on Friday, January 30th at 5:00 pm PST.
